titles.title: A bill to provide that funds available to the Department of Agriculture for the prescription of final regulations relating to certain law enforcement activities of the Forest Service be utilized instead for the improvement of trails on National Forest System lands for the purpose of improving the access of individuals with disabilities to such lands.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4835)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Research, Conservation, Forestry and General Legislation

bill.summary: 4/26/1994--Introduced. Makes certain Department of Agriculture funds available to improve National Forest System trail accessibility for disabled persons.
